title: DYNAMICS OF RESIDENTIAL INDOOR GAS- AND PARTICLE-PHASE WATER-SOLUBLE ORGANIC CARBON: MEASUREMENTS DURING THE CASA EXPERIMENT
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00340C, Paper
Marc Herman Webb, Glenn C. Morrison, Karsten Baumann, Jienan Li, Jenna C. Ditto, Han N. Huynh, Jie Yu, Kathryn Mayer, Liora Mael, Marina Eller Vance, Delphine Farmer, Jonathan Abbatt, Dustin Poppendieck, Barbara J. Turpin
Previous time-integrated (2 h to 4 h) measurements show that total gas-phase water-soluble organic carbon (WSOCg) is 10 to 20 times higher inside homes compared to outside. However, concentration dynamics...
